verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Command <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they put out <WH7971> of the camp <WH4264> every leper <WH6879>, and every one that hath an issue <WH2100>, and whosoever is unclean <WH2931> by the dead <WH5315>:

both male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> shall ye put out <WH7971>, without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> shall ye put <WH7971> them <WH2930>; that they defile not their camp <WH4264>, in the midst <WH8432> whereof <WH834> I dwell <WH7931>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did so <WH6213>, and put them out <WH7971> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>; as Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, so did <WH6213> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, When a man <WH376> or woman <WH802> shall commit <WH6213> any sin <WH2403> that men <WH120> commit <WH4603>, so as to trespass <WH4604> against Jehovah <WH3068>, and that soul <WH5315> shall be guilty <WH816>;

then he shall confess <WH3034> his sin <WH2403> which he hath done <WH6213>: and he shall make restitution <WH7725> for his guilt <WH817> in full <WH7218>, and add <WH3254> unto it the fifth <WH2549> part thereof <WH5414>, and give it unto him in respect of whom he hath been guilty <WH816>.

But if the man <WH376> have no kinsman <WH1350> to whom restitution <WH7725> may be made for the guilt <WH817>, the restitution <WH7725> for guilt <WH817> which is made unto Jehovah <WH3068> shall be the priest <WH3548>'s; besides the ram <WH352> of the atonement <WH3725>, whereby atonement shall be made for him <WH3722>.
And every heave-offering <WH8641> of all the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which they present <WH7126> unto the priest <WH3548>, shall be his.
And every man <WH376>'s hallowed things <WH6944> shall be his <WH376>: whatsoever any man giveth <WH5414> the priest <WH3548>, it shall be his.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH376>, If any man <WH376>'s wife <WH802> go aside <WH7847>, and commit <WH4603> a trespass against him <WH4604>,

and a man <WH376> lie <WH7901> with her carnally <WH7902>, and it be hid <WH5956> from the eyes <WH5869> of her husband <WH376>, and be kept close <WH5641>, and she be defiled <WH2930>, and there be no witness <WH5707> against her <WH8610>, and she be not taken in the act;

and the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> come <WH5674> upon him <WH7065>, and he be jealous of his wife <WH802>, and she be defiled <WH2930>: or if the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> come <WH5674> upon him <WH7065>, and he be jealous of his wife <WH802>, and she be not defiled <WH2930>:

then shall the man <WH376> bring <WH935> his wife <WH802> unto the priest <WH3548>, and shall bring <WH935> her oblation <WH7133> for her <WH6224>, the tenth part of an ephah <WH374> of barley <WH8184> meal <WH7058>; he shall pour <WH3332> no oil <WH8081> upon it <WH5414>, nor put frankincense <WH3828> thereon <WH4503>; for it is a meal-offering of jealousy <WH7068>, a meal-offering <WH4503> of memorial <WH2146>, bringing <WH2142> iniquity <WH5771> to remembrance <WH2142>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall bring her near <WH7126>, and set <WH5975> her before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>:

and the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> holy <WH6918> water <WH4325> in an earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627>; and of the dust <WH6083> that is on the floor <WH7172> of the tabernacle <WH4908> the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947>, and put <WH5414> it into the water <WH4325>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall set <WH5975> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, and let the hair of the woman <WH802>'s head <WH7218> go loose <WH6544>, and put <WH5414> the meal-offering <WH4503> of memorial <WH2146> in her hands <WH3709>, which is the meal-offering <WH4503> of jealousy <WH7068>: and the priest <WH3548> shall have in his hand <WH3027> the water <WH4325> of bitterness <WH4751> that causeth the curse <WH779>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall cause her to swear <WH7650>, and shall say <WH559> unto the woman <WH802>, If no man <WH376> have lain <WH7901> with thee <WH7847>, and if thou have not gone aside to uncleanness <WH2932>, being under thy husband <WH376>, be thou free <WH5352> from this water <WH4325> of bitterness <WH4751> that causeth the curse <WH779>.

But if thou have gone aside <WH7847>, being under thy husband <WH376>, and if thou be defiled <WH2930>, and some man <WH376> have <WH5414> lain <WH7903> with thee besides <WH1107> thy husband <WH376>:

then the priest <WH3548> shall cause <WH7650> the woman <WH802> to swear with the oath <WH7621> of cursing <WH423>, and the priest <WH3548> shall say <WH559> unto the woman <WH802>, Jehovah <WH3068> make <WH5414> thee a curse <WH423> and an oath <WH7621> among <WH8432> thy people <WH5971>, when Jehovah <WH3068> doth make <WH5414> thy thigh <WH3409> to fall away <WH5307>, and thy body <WH990> to swell <WH6639>;

and this water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall go <WH935> into thy bowels <WH4578>, and make thy body <WH990> to swell <WH6638>, and thy thigh <WH3409> to fall away <WH5307>. And the woman <WH802> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>, Amen <WH543>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall write <WH3789> these curses <WH423> in a book <WH5612>, and he shall blot <WH4229> them out into the water <WH4325> of bitterness <WH4751>:

and he shall make the woman <WH802> drink <WH8248> the water <WH4325> of bitterness <WH4751> that causeth the curse <WH779>; and the water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her and become bitter <WH4751>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the meal-offering <WH4503> of jealousy <WH7068> out of the woman <WH802>'s hand <WH3027>, and shall wave <WH5130> the meal-offering <WH4503> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, and bring <WH7126> it unto the altar <WH4196>:

and the priest <WH3548> shall take a handful <WH7061> of the meal-offering <WH4503>, as the memorial <WH234> thereof <WH6999>, and burn it upon the altar <WH4196>, and afterward <WH310> shall make the woman <WH802> drink <WH8248> the water <WH4325>.

And when he hath made her drink <WH8248> the water <WH4325>, then it shall come to pass <WH2930>, if she be defiled, and have committed <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> against her husband <WH376>, that the water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her and become bitter <WH4751>, and her body <WH990> shall swell <WH6638>, and her thigh <WH3409> shall fall away <WH5307>: and the woman <WH802> shall be a curse <WH423> among <WH7130> her people <WH5971>.
And if the woman <WH802> be not defiled <WH2930>, but be clean <WH2889>; then she shall be free <WH5352>, and shall conceive <WH2232> seed <WH2233>.
This is the law <WH8451> of jealousy <WH7068>, when a wife <WH802>, being under her husband <WH376>, goeth aside <WH7847>, and is defiled <WH2930>;

or when the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> cometh <WH5674> upon a man <WH376>, and he is jealous <WH7065> of his wife <WH802>; then shall he set <WH5975> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, and the priest <WH3548> shall execute <WH6213> upon her all this law <WH8451>.
And the man <WH376> shall be free <WH5352> from iniquity <WH5771>, and that <WH1931> woman <WH802> shall bear <WH5375> her iniquity <WH5771>.
